name: cntzcmnf
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(crn(c0), cfv(c1, crn(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wss(crn(c0), c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, crn(c0)), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(crn(c0), cfv(c1, crn(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wss(crn(c0), c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, crn(c0)), c2))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, crn(c0)), c2), wcel(c3, ccmn), wss(crn(c0), c2))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (c1 ` ran(c0))= c2, c3 ∈ CMnd, ran(c0)⊆ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, crn(c0)), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccmn))
-| wi(w0, wss(crn(c0), c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c3, ccmn), wss(crn(c0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c1, crn(c0)), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(crn(c0), cfv(c1, crn(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wss(crn(c0), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccmn))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c3, ccmn), wss(crn(c0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c1, crn(c0)), c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ran(c0)⊆(c1 ` ran(c0)))
⊣ (w0 → ran(c0)⊆ c2)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ CMnd)
⊣ ((c3 ∈ CMnd ∧ ran(c0)⊆ c2)→(c1 ` ran(c0))= c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(crn(c0), c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(crn(c0), cfv(c1, crn(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccmn))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c3, ccmn), wss(crn(c0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c1, crn(c0)), c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c3, ccmn), wss(crn(c0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c1, crn(c0)), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ccntz, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c3 ∈ CMnd ∧ ran(c0)⊆ c2)→(c1 ` ran(c0))= c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c1 =(Cntz ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(crn(c0), cfv(c1, crn(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccmn))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ccntz, c3))

comment: Discharge the centralizer assumption in a commutative monoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)
